replacements.consistency_note: Align dependent figures so 103.1 (SOUND POWER LEVEL) − 1.35 (K2) ≈ 101.8 (SWLA−k2). Also lower the Page 2 'Average A-weighted Sound Data: Sound Power (dBA) 111.14' to 103.14 and update WATTS entries accordingly.
Ensure SWLA−k2 equals 103.1 − 1.35 ≈ 101.8 (see T1). Update associated A-weighted watts proportionally to maintain internal consistency.

If the operator-zone SPL correlates to a specific microphone reading (e.g., Page 1 'Mic # ... 10 107.2 106.1'), update that cell to 97.2 (and its paired 106.1 to 96.1) to avoid cross-page discrepancies.
